name: Ball 'n Seek
description:
This is a multiplayer game. In this game The SEEKER must catch The RUNNER to win the game. The SEEKER is controlled by arrow keys and The RUNNER is controlled by WASD. The SEEKER must collide with The RUNNER to catch him.

Controls

WASD - Runner ( white ball )

Arrow keys - Seeker ( metal ball )

Alt + F4 - Quit game
